an7.20:4.1: “Mendicants, there are these seven qualifications for graduation.
an7.20:4.3: It’s when a mendicant has a keen enthusiasm to undertake the training … to examine the teachings … to get rid of desires … for solitude … to rouse up energy … for mindfulness and alertness … to penetrate with view. And they don’t lose these desires in the future.
an7.20:4.4: These are the seven qualifications for graduation.”
